useCase.name: Delete Order
useCase.description: Allows an employee to delete an order from the system.

preconditions.precondition: The employee has the necessary permissions to delete orders.

successEndConditions.condition: The order is successfully deleted from the system.

failureEndConditions.condition: The order cannot be deleted due to an error.

useCase.trigger: Employee selects an order to delete.

mainSequence.step: Employee selects the order to delete.
Frontend Interface sends a delete request with the order ID to Backend Server.
Backend Server queries the Database to delete the order with the specified ID.
Database confirms the deletion of the order.
Backend Server returns a success message to the Frontend Interface.
Frontend Interface displays a success message to the Employee.

asteps.step: Order is not found or cannot be deleted.
Backend Server returns an error message to the Frontend Interface.
Frontend Interface displays an error message to the Employee.
